options.title: --backup[=CONTROL]
options.description: make a backup of each existing destination file

options.title: -b
options.description: like --backup but does not accept an argument

options.title: -d, -F, --directory
options.description: allow the superuser to attempt to hard link directories (note: will probably fail due to system restrictions, even for the superuser)

options.title: -d, -F, --directory
options.description: allow the superuser to attempt to hard link directories (note: will probably fail due to system restrictions, even for the superuser)

options.title: -d, -F, --directory
options.description: allow the superuser to attempt to hard link directories (note: will probably fail due to system restrictions, even for the superuser)

options.title: -f, --force
options.description: remove existing destination files

options.title: -f, --force
options.description: remove existing destination files

options.title: -i, --interactive
options.description: prompt whether to remove destinations

options.title: -i, --interactive
options.description: prompt whether to remove destinations

options.title: -L, --logical
options.description: dereference TARGETs that are symbolic links

options.title: -L, --logical
options.description: dereference TARGETs that are symbolic links

options.title: -n, --no-dereference
options.description: treat LINK_NAME as a normal file if it is a symbolic link to a directory

options.title: -n, --no-dereference
options.description: treat LINK_NAME as a normal file if it is a symbolic link to a directory

options.title: -P, --physical
options.description: make hard links directly to symbolic links

options.title: -P, --physical
options.description: make hard links directly to symbolic links

options.title: -r, --relative
options.description: with -s, create links relative to link location

options.title: -r, --relative
options.description: with -s, create links relative to link location

options.title: -s, --symbolic
options.description: make symbolic links instead of hard links

options.title: -s, --symbolic
options.description: make symbolic links instead of hard links

options.title: -S, --suffix=SUFFIX
options.description: override the usual backup suffix

options.title: -S, --suffix=SUFFIX
options.description: override the usual backup suffix

options.title: -t, --target-directory=DIRECTORY
options.description: specify the DIRECTORY in which to create the links

options.title: -t, --target-directory=DIRECTORY
options.description: specify the DIRECTORY in which to create the links

options.title: -T, --no-target-directory
options.description: treat LINK_NAME as a normal file always

options.title: -T, --no-target-directory
options.description: treat LINK_NAME as a normal file always

options.title: -v, --verbose
options.description: print name of each linked file

options.title: -v, --verbose
options.description: print name of each linked file

options.title: --help
options.description: display this help and exit

options.title: --version
options.description: output version information and exit
